content: I don't suppose anyone else experiences the zulip UI being jumpy when first loaded? And has a fix for it? I.e. I load the page, start reading something, and 10 seconds in the UI updates itself and takes me somewhere jarringly different. It's quite minor but still has managed to irk me.
Yes, I've seen this. A couple of weeks ago it was much worse, the jump happening randomly. They fixed that issue but it seems it came back in a different way.
